title: Do you think the Age of Discovery was an age of exploration or invasion? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, because throughout history, new discoveries often funded by politicians and people with money in order to exploit new resources. Like the Spanish funding the Columbus’ expeditions to find South America only to grab the wealth of the land and enslave the people. Or like when Portuguese were forced to find alternative route to Asia when Constantinople had fallen in 1400s.
Both, but legally a group cannot invade a land with no politcal constituency. You cannot use political terms of today where the bodies by which these terms are used did not exist.
